Boots.description:
+25% Attack Speed

UNIQUE Passive - Enhanced Movement: +45 Movement Speed

(Unique Passives with the same name don't stack.)
Boots.name: Berserker's Greaves
Boots.plaintext: Enhances Movement Speed and Attack Speed
Boots.sanitizedDescription: +25% Attack Speed UNIQUE Passive - Enhanced Movement: +45 Movement Speed (Unique Passives with the same name don't stack.)

Boots.description:
+15 Magic Penetration

UNIQUE Passive - Enhanced Movement: +45 Movement Speed

(Magic Penetration: Magic damage is increased by ignoring an amount of the target's Magic Resist equal to Magic Penetration.)

(Unique Passives with the same name don't stack.)
Boots.name: Sorcerer's Shoes
Boots.plaintext: Enhances Movement Speed and magic damage
Boots.sanitizedDescription: +15 Magic Penetration UNIQUE Passive - Enhanced Movement: +45 Movement Speed (Magic Penetration: Magic damage is increased by ignoring an amount of the target's Magic Resist equal to Magic Penetration.) (Unique Passives with the same name don't stack.)

Boots.description:
UNIQUE Passive: +15% Cooldown Reduction
UNIQUE Passive - Enhanced Movement: +45 Movement Speed

(Unique Passives with the same name don't stack.)

''This item is dedicated in honor of Ionia's victory over Noxus in the Rematch for the Southern Provinces on 10 December, 20 CLE.''
Boots.name: Ionian Boots of Lucidity
Boots.plaintext: Increases Movement Speed and Cooldown Reduction

''This item is dedicated in honor of Ionia's victory over Noxus in the Rematch for the Southern Provinces on 10 December, 20 CLE.''

Elixirs.description:
Level 9 required to purchase.

Click to Consume: Grants +40 Ability Power, 15 bonus Mana Regen per 5 seconds and Sorcery for 3 minutes.

Sorcery: Damaging a champion or turret deals 25 bonus True Damage. This effect has a 5 second cooldown versus champions but no cooldown versus turrets.

(Only one Flask effect may be active at a time.)
Elixirs.name: Elixir of Sorcery
Elixirs.plaintext: Temporarily grants Ability Power and Bonus Damage to champions and turrets.
Elixirs.sanitizedDescription: Level 9 required to purchase. Click to Consume: Grants +40 Ability Power, 15 bonus Mana Regen per 5 seconds and Sorcery for 3 minutes. Sorcery: Damaging a champion or turret deals 25 bonus True Damage. This effect has a 5 second cooldown versus champions but no cooldown versus turrets. (Only one Flask effect may be active at a time.)

Endgame Items.description:
+40% Attack Speed
+80 Ability Power

UNIQUE Passive: +20% Cooldown Reduction
UNIQUE Passive: Basic attacks deal 15 (+15% of Ability Power) bonus magic damage on hit.
Endgame Items.name: Nashor's Tooth
Endgame Items.plaintext: Increases Attack Speed, Ability Power, and Cooldown Reduction
Endgame Items.sanitizedDescription: +40% Attack Speed +80 Ability Power UNIQUE Passive: +20% Cooldown Reduction UNIQUE Passive: Basic attacks deal 15 (+15% of Ability Power) bonus magic damage on hit.

Endgame Items.description:
+70% Attack Speed

UNIQUE Passive: When basic attacking, bolts are fired at up to 2 enemies near the target, each dealing (50% of Attack Damage) physical damage. These bolts apply on-hit effects.
UNIQUE Passive: Basic attacks deal an additional 10 physical damage on hit.
Endgame Items.name: Runaan's Hurricane (Ranged Only)
Endgame Items.plaintext: Ranged attacks fire two bolts at nearby enemies
Endgame Items.sanitizedDescription: +70% Attack Speed UNIQUE Passive: When basic attacking, bolts are fired at up to 2 enemies near the target, each dealing (50% of Attack Damage) physical damage. These bolts apply on-hit effects. UNIQUE Passive: Basic attacks deal an additional 10 physical damage on hit.

Endgame Items.description:
+120 Ability Power

UNIQUE Passive: Increases Ability Power by 35%.
Endgame Items.name: Rabadon's Deathcap
Endgame Items.sanitizedDescription: +120 Ability Power UNIQUE Passive: Increases Ability Power by 35%.

Endgame Items.description:
+400 Health
+100 Ability Power

UNIQUE Passive: Damaging spells and abilities apply a Movement Speed reduction to enemies based on the spell type:

Single Target: 40% reduction for 1.5 seconds.
Area of Effect: 40% reduction for 1 seconds
Damage over Time or Multi-hit: 20% reduction for 1 seconds.
Summoned Minions: 20% reduction for 1 seconds.

(If a spell fits in more than one category, it uses the weakest slow value.)
Endgame Items.name: Rylai's Crystal Scepter
Endgame Items.sanitizedDescription: +400 Health +100 Ability Power UNIQUE Passive: Damaging spells and abilities apply a Movement Speed reduction to enemies based on the spell type: Single Target: 40% reduction for 1.5 seconds. Area of Effect: 40% reduction for 1 seconds Damage over Time or Multi-hit: 20% reduction for 1 seconds. Summoned Minions: 20% reduction for 1 seconds. (If a spell fits in more than one category, it uses the weakest slow value.)

Endgame Items.description:
+50% Attack Speed
+30 Magic Resist

UNIQUE Passive: Basic attacks deal 42 bonus magic damage on hit.
UNIQUE Passive: Basic attacks steal 5 Magic Resist from the target on hit (stacks up to 5 times.)
Endgame Items.name: Wit's End
Endgame Items.plaintext: Deals bonus magic damage on basic attacks
Endgame Items.sanitizedDescription: +50% Attack Speed +30 Magic Resist UNIQUE Passive: Basic attacks deal 42 bonus magic damage on hit. UNIQUE Passive: Basic attacks steal 5 Magic Resist from the target on hit (stacks up to 5 times.)

Endgame Items.description:
+80 Ability Power
+5% Movement Speed
+250 Mana

UNIQUE Passive - Spellblade: After using an ability, the next basic attack deals 75% Base Attack Damage (+50% of Ability Power) bonus magic damage on hit (1.5 second cooldown).

(Unique Passives with the same name don't stack.)
Endgame Items.name: Lich Bane
Endgame Items.plaintext: Grants a bonus to next attack after spell cast
Endgame Items.sanitizedDescription: +80 Ability Power +5% Movement Speed +250 Mana UNIQUE Passive - Spellblade: After using an ability, the next basic attack deals 75% Base Attack Damage (+50% of Ability Power) bonus magic damage on hit (1.5 second cooldown). (Unique Passives with the same name don't stack.)

Endgame Items.description:
+80 Ability Power

UNIQUE Passive: Magic damage ignores 35% of the target's Magic Resist (applies before Magic Penetration).
Endgame Items.name: Void Staff
Endgame Items.sanitizedDescription: +80 Ability Power UNIQUE Passive: Magic damage ignores 35% of the target's Magic Resist (applies before Magic Penetration).

Jungle Items.description:
+30 Bonus Gold per Large Monster Kill
Passive - Blasting Smite: Smite deals damage in an area, dealing half damage to all monsters and enemy minions near the target and stuns them for 1.5 seconds. Casting Smite on a monster restores 15% of missing Health and Mana.

Passive - Jungler: Deal 45 additional magic damage to monsters over 2 seconds and gain 10 Health Regen and 5 Mana Regen per second while under attack from neutral monsters.

Limited to 1 Jungle item
Jungle Items.name: Ranger's Trailblazer
Jungle Items.plaintext: Makes your Smite hit all monsters in an area, stunning them.
Jungle Items.sanitizedDescription: +30 Bonus Gold per Large Monster Kill Passive - Blasting Smite: Smite deals damage in an area, dealing half damage to all monsters and enemy minions near the target and stuns them for 1.5 seconds. Casting Smite on a monster restores 15% of missing Health and Mana. Passive - Jungler: Deal 45 additional magic damage to monsters over 2 seconds and gain 10 Health Regen and 5 Mana Regen per second while under attack from neutral monsters. Limited to 1 Jungle item

Jungle Items.description:
+30 Bonus Gold per Large Monster Kill
Passive - Challenging Smite: Smite can be cast on enemy champions, marking them for 4 seconds. While marked, basic attacks deal true damage over 3 seconds, you have vision of them, and their damage to you is reduced by 20%.

Passive - Jungler: Deal 45 additional magic damage to monsters over 2 seconds and gain 10 Health Regen and 5 Mana Regen per second while under attack from neutral monsters.

Limited to 1 Jungle item
Jungle Items.name: Skirmisher's Sabre
Jungle Items.plaintext: Lets your Smite mark Champions, giving you combat power against them.
Jungle Items.sanitizedDescription: +30 Bonus Gold per Large Monster Kill Passive - Challenging Smite: Smite can be cast on enemy champions, marking them for 4 seconds. While marked, basic attacks deal true damage over 3 seconds, you have vision of them, and their damage to you is reduced by 20%. Passive - Jungler: Deal 45 additional magic damage to monsters over 2 seconds and gain 10 Health Regen and 5 Mana Regen per second while under attack from neutral monsters. Limited to 1 Jungle item

Starting Items.description:
Limited to 1 Trinket.

Active: Places a Stealth Ward that lasts 60 seconds (120 second cooldown).

At level 9, this ward's duration increases to 120 seconds.

Limit 3 Stealth Wards on the map per player.

(Trinkets cannot be used in the first 30 seconds of a game. Selling a Trinket will disable Trinket use for 120 seconds).
Starting Items.name: Warding Totem (Trinket)
Starting Items.sanitizedDescription: Limited to 1 Trinket. Active: Places a Stealth Ward that lasts 60 seconds (120 second cooldown). At level 9, this ward's duration increases to 120 seconds. Limit 3 Stealth Wards on the map per player. (Trinkets cannot be used in the first 30 seconds of a game. Selling a Trinket will disable Trinket use for 120 seconds).
